title: Does saying SubhanAllahi wa bihamdihi 100 times a day (not in mor/eve adhkar) remove all minor sins?
transcript: does reciting Subhan allaham only 100 times a day and not 100 times in the morning and the evening also remove all my minor sins and the answer is yes saying Subhan once 100 times a day does the job if you say it in the morning in the evening following the Sunnah of the Prophet Alam that's a double uh um benefit to it and it impacts your um forgiveness the possibility of for forgiveness of your minor sins uh further more and Allah asael knows best so we
